instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
instructions.2: Place cauliflower onto a cutting board with stem-side facing up; cut vertically into 4 evenly thick steaks. Arrange steaks onto the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil over steaks; season with garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
instructions.3: Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, flip with a spatula, and continue to roast until soft in the middle and darkening around edges, about 15 minutes more.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is black pepper from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and roast (Step 3) at the same time?
